name: [GMTK 2019] Burn Out
description:
Burn Your Way Out!

A tile-based puzzle game with fire mechanics. Time only moves when you do!

There is no audio!

  • Time only advances one move at a time
  • Only one item can be held at a time
  • One major mechanic: fire
Instructions
  • Arrow keys to move; Enter on start screen
  • Time only moves when you do
  • There are three runs you can achieve. Look for secrets
  • There are only 2 levels
